feed.title: Kairo Araujo - Fast tip, Linux, Unix Notes

entry.title: Extracting files from rpm
entry.summary:
First you need rpm2cpio

Use

# mkdir /tmp/package # cp package.rpm /tmp/package # cd /tmp/package # rpm2cpio package.rpm | cpio -idv

Posted by Wordmobi
entry.content:
First you need rpm2cpio

Use

# mkdir /tmp/package # cp package.rpm /tmp/package # cd /tmp/package # rpm2cpio package.rpm | cpio -idv

Posted by Wordmobi

entry.title: AIX Tip: Volume Group (VG) data redistribution in the disks - Strip
entry.summary:
For Volume Group data redistribution in the disks (strip) uses reorgvg command.

# reorgvg myvg

This command need a few times. Rum in background.

# nohup reorgvg myvg &

Posted byWordmobi
entry.content:
For Volume Group data redistribution in the disks (strip) uses reorgvg command.

# reorgvg myvg

This command need a few times. Rum in background.

# nohup reorgvg myvg &

Posted byWordmobi
